w12.title: The project
text: The project consists to create a turn by turn game that can be play in PVE or PVP. You can create/login account to save your progression (launcher account). You will be able to dowload and launch the game from the launcher
There are 1v1 and 2v2 games that are based on a procedural map wich create during the start of the match
Every player has three main characters per game, an HQ (Headquarter) and some classic units
The principle of the game is to destroy the ennemy HQ using the formed units
Main characters are the principal troops (the strongest of the game) like heroes that we can upgrade
Classic units are character which can be created using the money generated during the round
they can be created with a military base (Builders base, Naval Base, Air Base and Land Base). At the start, only the land base and builders base are unlocked
You can build up to 3 land base, find randomly the naval bases and take possession of the only air base placed at the middle of the map
Every characters have life, damages, shoot distance, power.s and moves

Builders (you can have a maximum of 3 builders) can repair, upgrade or take possession of some bases, but be careful, they can be killed before getting the possession of the base. A builder can repair a base in 4 turns unlike taking possesion which takes only 2 turns (can be adjusted). If a builder dies, The only possibility of having one again is to form a new at the Builders base
Other units can be created using the conquested bases.

w12.title: Features
text: Create/login account to save progression
Upgrade units
Open chests
Form units
Conquer bases
Have friends
Move units
Attack enemy units, bases
Play ranked games
Have a rank
Move camera on a game
See leaderboard

New items

w21.title: The project
text: The project consists to create a minecraft mod to manage alliances, villages and more
Every player who plays this mod can create a new alliance and can invite his friends
He can manage the roles into the alliance and the permissions
After this, he has to create his first village, first, he has to place a village controller block which claim chunks around it
In this claimed chunks, the player can create his base
After doing that, the player can place a town hall block which is the main building of the village
The player can also go into villages to recruit some villagers that will be reworked to be defenders, farmers, attackers, etc..
After a villager is recruited he will be able to be assigned to a task, but before, we need a building that can assign this task to him (Builder's house, Farm, Mine)
If the villager is assigned to it, he will do this task until he can (they need to eat and have tools)

Imagine that your villager is a builder, you can assign him to build a pre-created schematic in the mod, or create it yourself : Create a build somewhere and take what you want in the in-built schematic creator
There is also new items, utilities, mobs, electrical systems, etc..
{title}IN SOLO
Sometimes, there is some attacks from other villages that make damages to your constructions and destroy them
You can repair these using builders.
{title}IN MULTIPLAYER
You can declare a war face to an other vilage
In a war, you can attack him and take his ressources, but he can defend himself his own village
If you aren't in a war, no one can destroy your base
You can also have allies, neutrals and enemies

w21.title: Features
text: Create an alliance
Invite friends
Manage roles
Manage permission
Claim chunks
Recruit villagers
Form villagers
Attack other villages
Get a war front another village
Destroy structures
Structures have life before destroying (100HP / 200HP)
Build buildings
Create his own schematic

w27.title: The project
text: The project consists to create a procedural dungeon game (binding of isaac like) in which you will be able to fight mobs, upgrade your powers and fight bosses
Before the start, you can change character, start with other powers and invite friends in your local server (hamachi for exemple)
Every character have different stats (more life, less damages, ....) At every mob you kill, drops money and mana
The money and the mana can be used in shop, but some specific powers need X mana to be thrown

If you dont take damages after a stage, a basic shop will spawn at the next. Each stage you win consecutively will upgrade the shop, if you take damages, the shop returns to level 0 and not spawn at the next stage
{title}Hearts
In the game you will be able to collect hearts, there is different colours for differents stats :
{color:red,id:0}RED{/color} => Classic heart
{color:#3939ff,id:0}BLUE{/color} => Regeneration heart => while you have {color:#3939ff,id:0}1 blue heart{/color}, the others lost at this stage will regenerate when not fighting
{color:green,id:0}GREEN{/color} => Temp heart => stay on your life bar X seconds and after that, disapear
{color:orange,id:0}ORANGE{/color} => Shield heart => There is a chance that the you will not take damage

{color:violet,id:0}VIOLET{/color} => Damages/Donnation heart => Each {color:violet,id:0}violet heart{/color} you have increase you damage boost, but if you play in multiplayer, you will be able to give this heart to someone else, which will transform this violet heart in red heart
{color:#2c2c2c,id:0}BLACK{/color} => Respawn heart => This heart is not on your lifebar, but when you die, you'll respawn at the first room with {color:red,id:0}1 Red heart{/color}
{color:white,id:0}WHITE{/color} => Trap heart => While you have this heart, you'll not take damages from the traps
{title}Stages
At every 10 stages you will have a bossfight in the boss room, you can also be able to build the key of the destiny
In this place you can find a new special (bonus) dungeon, and there is chests, mini-bosses, mobs and a destiny shop which propose destiny armors, weapons and powers
To access this shop, you will need to win 4 stage in it (1, 2, 3, 4, shop)

w27.title: Features
text: Generate procedural dungeons
Implements stuff (Weapons, powers, armors)
Invite friends to local server
Get money and mana
Attack, be attacked, thow powers
Use money and mana to the shop
Upgarde the shop when not taking damages
Collect hearts
Fight mobs, mini-bosses, bosses and big boss
Go into the destiny dungeon

w29.title: The project
text: The project consists of creating a template engine in PHP to create my own 'language'
The template engine will translate .skillio language into php
On the skillio framework, there is some VIEWS which are the front-end of the website

The role of the new extension .skillio is to make the template engine recognize the files and translate some elements from the view into php to delete all the tags on the view and let uniquely some basic tags [for] ... [/for]

w29.title: Features
text: for [for $i = 0; $i < count($array); $i++] {{ $array[$i] }} [/for] // ['foo', 'too', 'boo'] => foo too boo
if [if $i < 5] // TRUE [else if $i > 6] // FALSE TRUE [else] //FALSE FALSE [/if]
foreach [foreach $foo as $key => $value] ... [/foreach]
while [while $i < 5] ... [/while]
do while [do] ... [/while $i < 5]
debug [dump $var]

w30.title: Features
text: Colors on the new tags
Auto fill the line
